forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Abundant sunshine. High 16C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 62F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Low near 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Low 42F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 17C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 63F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with a steady, soaking rain late. Increasing winds. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then becoming windy with a steady rain overnight. Low near 55F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 16C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 61F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 53F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain...mainly in the morning. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Periods of light rain early. High 59F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early giving way to a few showers after midnight. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early giving way to a few showers after midnight. Low 47F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High around 15C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low 6C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 43F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and some clouds. High 16C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and some clouds. High 61F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Low 7C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. Low 46F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning, then sunny in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers in the morning, then sunny in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 6C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 43F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High around 15C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Plentiful sunshine. High around 60F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear skies. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers in the morning, then clouds lingering in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early with mostly cloudy conditions later in the day. High 58F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 8C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 47F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 13C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 56F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 48F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
